title: Classic victoria sponge cake
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '225g margarine', '225g caster sugar', '4 eggs', 'Dash of vanilla essence', 'Dash of milk', '225g self-raising flour', 'For the buttercream', '150g unsalted butter', '225g icing sugar, sifted', '2 tablespoons hot milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the filling', 'Raspberry jam']
